A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A great Star Wars movie\, but a terrible movie to be in the trilogy. This review will contain mild spoilers. 
After rewatching The Force Awakens\, I can say with confidence that The Last Jedi is filled with plot holes. None of the questions from the previous film is fully answered\, the whole casino-storyline feels forced\, the characters keep making stupid decisions over and over again\, and it just felt really off. The tone was all over the place. It was the most Avengers-eque Star Wars film - so yes\, it had bursts of entertaining moments\, but also had way too many jokes. And not the 'Star Wars' type of humor\, but just manufactured quirky lines that are purposely designed to make you laugh. 

It had potential\, but was just all over the place. I just hope the next instalment can save this trilogy.
